alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 2:42PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect Rockingham and southeastern Strafford Counties... At 240 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was over Raymond, or 7 miles east of Auburn...moving east AT 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Raymond, Newington, Seabrook, Rye, Stratham, Newmarket, Londonderry, Hampstead, Atkinson and Kingston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 12 and 18. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 15. This also includes... Hampton Beach. * Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford
